cause.description:
The men and women that serve our country and protect our rights need the support of the people. Please thank a service member for all that they give and are willing to give so that you have the home and freedoms that they so willing risk their lives and well being for.
1. The Troops need the support of their fellow countrymen.
2. Even if you do not agree with the war or the politics behind it, you need to support the men & women of our armed forces.
3. The men & women of the armed forces are there everyday without fail, providing you with the freedoms that allow you to have the life that you have.
cause.mission: Support the troops that serve our country, both at home and overseas.
cause.name: Support Our Troops
